text.content: The spotlight effect refers to a person’s tendency to assume their mistakes and perceived personal flaws stand out clearly to others as if illuminated by a spotlight. Though in reality, everyone is busy solving their own problems. What's the last funny and embarrassing mistake you remember someone making? I can bet you have a hard time remembering.

rich_text.plain_text: The spotlight effect refers to a person’s tendency to assume their mistakes and perceived personal flaws stand out clearly to others as if illuminated by a spotlight.
